# TraceTagNames.DatabaseType field

Database type. For any SQL database,

```csharp
sql
```

. For others, the lower-case database category, e.g.

```csharp
cassandra
```

,

```csharp
hbase
```

, or

```csharp
redis
```

.

```csharp
public const string DatabaseType;
```
